prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with a robotic appearance and sleek purple accents.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that has unique jet-like features and vibrant colors.
Generate a futuristic Pokemon design that combines technology with natural elements.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both mechanical and organic characteristics, with a purple palette.
Make a legendary Pokemon that has a mysterious aura and advanced weapon-like limbs.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, with a sleek and agile body.
Give me a Pokemon that appears as a fusion of bug and steel types, with standout features.
